# PKLassoToolReference

**Class**

A tool for selecting stroked lines and shapes in a canvas view.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKLassoToolReference
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKLassoToolReference] object supports the selection of content on a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView]. When active, the canvas uses incoming touch events to determine what content to add to the selection.

Create a lasso tool programmatically or display a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker] object from which the user selects the tool. Assign the resulting object to the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView/tool-6str6] property of your [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKCanvasView] object. The canvas uses any subsequent touch sequences to select content on the canvas.

## Creating a lasso tool

- **init()**: Creates a lasso tool object for selecting content on a canvas view.
